item.title: [GRA1][Webhosting] - Cluster028 - Filerz985
item.description:
Oct 7, 10:22 UTC
Update - Defective equipment has been replaced.
A data consolidation operation is underway with an estimated duration of 7 days.
Performance may be degraded during this period.

Oct 7, 08:46 UTC
Identified - Update : Our teams will carry out the replacement of a hard disk.
Root cause : The cause of these slowdowns is a hardware defect.

Oct 7, 07:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/10/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowdown on filerz985
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA1
Scope of impact : All offers on cluster028 hosted on filerz985
Ongoing actions : Our teams are in the process of identifying the source of this disruption and fixing the problem.

item.title: [Global][Domains] - .com/.net
item.description:
Oct 5, 08:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC
End Time : 05/10/2022 07:45 UTC
Service impact : Customers couldn't register, renew, transfer, restore and delete orders on .com and .net domains
Root cause : Network equipment: Our teams isolated the equipment and are currently in contact with our equipment provider to definitely fix it.
Current status : Resolved

Oct 5, 07:54 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC
Service impact : Customers couldn't register, renew, transfer, restore and delete orders on .com and .net domains
Ongoing actions : The situation is back to normal since 05/10/2022 07:45 UTC.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Oct 5, 07:31 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC
Service impact : Customers can't register, renew, transfer, restore and delete orders on .com and .net domains
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

Service impact : Following a migration maintenance by Afnic that will entail all current operations on the .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names being unavailable. During this time, it will not be possible to:
=> Register or delete a .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf or .wf domain name
=> Make changes to .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names (transfer, update contacts, update name servers, etc.)
We apologize for the inconvenience

item.title: [GRA-BHS][Web hosting] - Sharedsql Database Upgrade
item.description:
Sep 29, 07:55 UTC
Completed - 100% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7

Update - 91% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu010 is now running MySQL 5.7.

Sep 21, 08:07 UTC
Update - 78% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu009 is now running MySQL 5.7.

Sep 15, 07:42 UTC
Update - 66% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu007 is now running MySQL 5.7.

Sep 12, 08:12 UTC
Update - 55% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu005 is now running MySQL 5.7.

Sep 7, 07:53 UTC
Update - 47% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu004 is now running MySQL 5.7.

Sep 1, 08:31 UTC
Update - 35% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu002 is now running MySQL 5.7.
We have now reached our cruising speed.

Aug 29, 09:28 UTC
Update - 23% of our infra now runs MySQL 5.7.
100% of eu001 is now running MySQL 5.7.
We are increasing the upgrade rate.

Aug 24, 07:49 UTC
Update - 18.5% of our infra is now running MySQL 5.7.
All new databases are now delivered with MySQL 5.7

Aug 19, 12:00 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 16, 08:36 UTC
Update - 100% of eu008 and ca001 are now running MySQL 5.7

Aug 10, 13:38 UTC
Update - UPDATE: 8% of our infra is now running MySQL 5.7. We are now increasing of upgrade rate

Aug 10, 13:35 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 10, 13:31 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 10, 13:29 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 20, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 20, 05:46 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/07/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 29/09/2022 13:10 UTC
Service impact : A downtime of one minute per instance may occur during this operation.
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we will carry out this maintenance for sharedSQL databases upgrades, from MySQL 5.6 to MySQL 5.7.
